sourcesContent:
<template>
    <AdminAdd @createOrUpdate="createOrUpdate"></AdminAdd>
</template>
<script>
import Cards from '../components/Cards.vue'
export default {
    name: "admin-page",
    components: {
        Cards
    },
    methods:{
        createOrUpdate: async function(item){
            const res = await api.createItem(item);
            this.flashMessage.success('Item created successfully!', 'success');
            this.$router.push(`/admin-add/${res._id}`);
    }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
</style>
